title: Closed on Account of Rabies
description: Title from container insert.	Read by Marianne Faithfull, Christopher Walken, Iggy Pop, Ken Nordine, Diamanda Galas, Gavin Friday, Jeff Buckley, Dr. John, Gabriel Byrne, Abel Ferrara ; sung by Ed Sanders ; Deborah Harry and the Jazz Passengers ; with musical accompaniment.	Compact disc.	CD 1. Burglars singing in the cellar. Alone Marianne Faithfull (1:30) -- Raven Christopher Walken (8:30) -- Tell- tale heart Iggy Pop (14:26) -- Conqueror worm Ken Nordine (3:00) -- Black cat Diamanda Galas (36:58) -- For Annie Gavin Friday (5:21) -- To Helen Ed Sanders (2:29) -- CD 2. Devil's brew. Haunted palace Ed Sanders (5:42) -- Ulalume Jeff Buckley (6:13) -- Berenice Dr. John (27:42) -- City and the sea Deborah Harry and the Jazz Passengers (8:04) -- Annabel Lee Marianne Faithfull (2:24) -- Masque of the red death Gabriel Byrne (18:13) -- Raven excerpt Abel Ferrara (1:57).
author: Edgar Allan Poe
